events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position with all required documents attached.
The application has been categorised under Engineering after review of the candidate's technical skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to coordinate the next steps for this candidate.
Initial screening call completed; the candidate demonstrated strong understanding of key software development concepts.
Candidate responded promptly and enthusiastically accepted the invitation for a technical interview next week.
Technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-08 at 10:00 AM UTC with the lead engineering team.
